author: Indiesoft LLC
description: YaGames is the Yandex.Games SDK extension for the Defold game engine.
name: YaGames

releases.message:
## What's Changed
* Implement Multiplayer Sessions API

## What's Changed

* Implemented ysdk.on / ysdk.off functions as `event_on`, `event_off`
* Implemented `player_is_authorized`

## What's Changed
* Update CI to Java 21 by @aglitchman in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-yagames/pull/34
* Add missing LuaDoc to all functions and improve assertions messages by @aglitchman in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-yagames/pull/33
* Assemble environment object to get values from getters in the debug mode by @aglitchman in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-yagames/pull/35

The Yandex Games platform has changed the URL to their SDK. Now it is relative instead of absolute - `/sdk.js`.

For this reason, a new option `sdk_url` has been added to the extension, where you can specify the old URL to the SDK (for example:)

```
[yagames]
sdk_url = https://yandex.ru/games/sdk/v2
```

Read more: https://yandex.ru/dev/games/doc/ru/release-notes#17-iyulya-2024-g

## What's Changed
* Implemented Gameplay API.
* Implemented Server Time API.

## What's Changed

* Implemented `product.getPriceCurrencyImage` .
* Implemented `ysdk.isAvailableMethod`.
* Revised README, removed old info.

This version adds support for Defold 1.8.0. Also added new player profile function `yagames.player_get_paying_status()`. Improved the mock.lua module.

Removed deprecated functions to create RTB banners (use sticky ads).

This release implements the new remote config feature - https://yandex.ru/dev/games/doc/en/sdk/sdk-config

Usage example:
```lua
    local options = { defaultFlags = { test1 = "A" } } -- also, it can be `nil`
    yagames.flags_get(options, function(self, err, result)
        -- result is a table
    end)
````
This release implements the function `ysdk.features.LoadingAPI?.ready()`, which informs the SDK that the game has loaded and is ready to play.

Due to the changes to the dmJson API, it's an updated version of YaGames for use with the Defold 1.4.0+. More info on [the Defold forum](https://forum.defold.com/t/defold-1-4-0-beta/71987).

**Changelog**: https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-yagames/compare/0.8.1...0.9.0

Native Cache support updated to be in line with [the docs](https://yandex.ru/dev/games/doc/dg/concepts/native-cache-settings.html?lang=en): 
> if the app is running on a platform that supports Native Cache and Native Cache is enabled in the app, we need to unregister all Service Workers for Native Cache to work correctly.

## What's Changed
* Sticky banners API in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-yagames/pull/14

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-yagames/compare/0.7.6...0.8.0
Fix: `event_on` didn't work properly in the previous release.

## What's New
* Added functions for the events: `yagames.event_on(event_name, listener)`, `yagames.event_dispatch(event_name)` ([docs](https://yandex.ru/dev/games/doc/dg/sdk/sdk-events.html?lang=en))

## What's New
* Added the `yagames.player_get_mode()` function. More information (in Russian) - https://yandex.ru/blog/gamesfordevelopers/novye-vozmozhnosti-dlya-neavtorizovannykh-polzovateley

The release adds a function to get player's personal info. Use it to check the auth mode:

```lua
yagames.player_init({scopes = false, signed = true}, function(self, err)
    if not err then
        local personal_info = yagames.player_get_personal_info()
        if personal_info.mode == "lite" then
            -- do something!
        end
    end
end)
```

## What's Changed
* Fixed error when recalling yagames.init by @sergeysinyavsky in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-yagames/pull/10
* Added RTB banner option "append_to_id"
